Text:
- Install the software using 'Zinc_4.0_Builder_4.0.4.exe'

- Delete the file 'Zinc.exe' and folder 'plugins' from the installation folder (C:Program Files (x86)Zinc 4.0)

- Copy the file 'Zinc.exe' and folder 'plugins' from the folder 'zinc4.0.0.crack' to the installation folder (C:Program Files (x86)Zinc 4.0)
